# Ministry of Culture and Sports (Guatemala)

| preceding1      =
| preceding2      =

| jurisdiction    = Guatemala

| chief1_name     = Liwy Grazioso

| website         =

The Ministry of Culture and Sports ( or MCD) is a government ministry of Guatemala, headquartered in Zone 1 of Guatemala City. It is responsible for promoting, developing, and conserving initiatives relating to Guatemalan culture and heritage.
Liwy Grazioso is the current Minister of Culture and Sport.
